trans-unit.source: About <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> Multi-Server Configuration

seg-source.mrk: About <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> Multi-Server Configuration

target.mrk: À propos de la configuration multi-serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

trans-unit.source: Terminology

seg-source.mrk: Terminology

target.mrk: Terminologie

trans-unit.source: A <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> multi-server configuration is composed of a <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> master server and several <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> nodes.

seg-source.mrk: A <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> multi-server configuration is composed of a <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> master server and several <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> nodes.

target.mrk: Une configuration multi-serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> est composée d'un serveur master <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> et de plusieurs nœuds <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: A master server:

seg-source.mrk: A master server:

target.mrk: Un serveur master :

trans-unit.source: Represents an entry point to all administration operations.

seg-source.mrk: Represents an entry point to all administration operations.

target.mrk: Représente un point d'entrée pour toutes les opérations d'administration.

trans-unit.source: Contains the definition of all backup configuration objects.

seg-source.mrk: Contains the definition of all backup configuration objects.

target.mrk: Contient la définition de tous les objets de configuration de sauvegarde.

trans-unit.source: Centralizes license management.

seg-source.mrk: Centralizes license management.

target.mrk: Centralise la gestion des licences.

trans-unit.source: Assigns a tenant and a node to any new agent.

seg-source.mrk: Assigns a tenant and a node to any new agent.

target.mrk: Affecte une entité et un nœud à tout nouvel agent.

trans-unit.source: A node:

seg-source.mrk: A node:

target.mrk: Un noeud :

trans-unit.source: Is a standalone server used to contain information regarding the agents and tenants associated with this node. For more information on tenants, see <MadCap:xref href="Tenants.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Tenants</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: Is a standalone server used to contain information regarding the agents and tenants associated with this node.
For more information on tenants, see <MadCap:xref href="Tenants.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Tenants</MadCap:xref>.

target.mrk: Est un serveur autonome (standalone) utilisé pour contenir des informations concernant les agents et les entités associés à ce nœud.
Pour plus d'informations sur les entités, voir <MadCap:xref href="Tenants.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Tenants</MadCap:xref>.

trans-unit.source: Contains up to 2000 agents. If a problem occurs on a node, only the agents on this node are impacted.

seg-source.mrk: Contains up to 2000 agents.
If a problem occurs on a node, only the agents on this node are impacted.

target.mrk: Contient jusqu'à 2000 agents.
Si un problème survient sur un nœud, seuls les agents de ce nœud sont impactés.

trans-unit.source: In the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, you cannot create a node, but you can modify some properties of an existing node.

seg-source.mrk: In the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, you cannot create a node, but you can modify some properties of an existing node.

target.mrk: Dans la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, vous ne pouvez pas créer de nœud, mais vous pouvez modifier certaines propriétés d'un nœud existant.

trans-unit.source: Data transfer between nodes, agents and the master server

seg-source.mrk: Data transfer between nodes, agents and the master server

target.mrk: Transfert de données entre les noeuds, les agents et le serveur master

trans-unit.source: In a multi-server configuration, only the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> nodes and agents communicate with the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> master server. For instance, a <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agent can communicate with the master server so that the master server assigns the agent to a specific node. The number of nodes that can be created in a multi-server configuration is not limited.

seg-source.mrk: In a multi-server configuration, only the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> nodes and agents communicate with the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> master server.

For instance, a <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agent can communicate with the master server so that the master server assigns the agent to a specific node.
The number of nodes that can be created in a multi-server configuration is not limited.

target.mrk: Dans une configuration multi-serveur, seuls les nœuds et les agents <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> communiquent avec le serveur master <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

Par exemple, un agent <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> peut communiquer avec le serveur master de sorte que le serveur master attribue l'agent à un noeud spécifique.
Le nombre de nœuds pouvant être créés dans une configuration multi-serveur n'est pas limité.

trans-unit.source: The <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> is used to:

target.mrk: La <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> est utilisée pour :

trans-unit.source: Centralize or edit information on strategies, users and user profiles, protection policies, rules, zones, paths, files categories or agents.

seg-source.mrk: Centralize or edit information on strategies, users and user profiles, protection policies, rules, zones, paths, files categories or agents.

target.mrk: Centraliser ou modifier les informations sur les stratégies, les utilisateurs et les profils d'utilisateurs, les politiques de protection, les règles, les zones, les chemins, les catégories de fichiers ou les agents.

trans-unit.source: Manage restore and backups on any or all <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> servers known from the master server.

seg-source.mrk: Manage restore and backups on any or all <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> servers known from the master server.

target.mrk: Gérer la restauration et les sauvegardes sur tout ou partie des serveurs <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> connus du serveur master.

trans-unit.source: Centralize reporting on agents, tenants, notifications, nodes and the master server. In the , a superadmin can display nodes and tenants associated with an agent (agents view) or notifications sent from nodes (notifications view), using the button below the total number of items.

seg-source.mrk: Centralize reporting on agents, tenants, notifications, nodes and the master server.
In the , a superadmin can display nodes and tenants associated with an agent (agents view) or notifications sent from nodes (notifications view), using the button below the total number of items.

target.mrk: Centraliser les rapports sur les agents, les entités, les notifications, les nœuds et le serveur master.

Dans la , un superadmin peut afficher des nœuds et des entités associés à un agent (vue agents) ou des notifications envoyées à partir des nœuds (vue notifications), en utilisant le bouton en dessous du nombre total d'éléments.

trans-unit.source: Switch from a standalone configuration with existing agents to a multi-server configuration. To implement a multi-server configuration, you must install new servers and agents.

seg-source.mrk: Switch from a standalone configuration with existing agents to a multi-server configuration.
To implement a multi-server configuration, you must install new servers and agents.

target.mrk: Passer d'une configuration autonome avec des agents existants à une configuration multi-serveur.
Pour mettre en place une configuration multi-serveur, vous devez installer de nouveaux serveurs et agents.

trans-unit.source: Implement a multi-server configuration in a <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> version below <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> <MadCap:variable name="General.VersionNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
